code: import React from'react';import{useParams,useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{useBooking}from'../context/BookingContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BookingDetails(){const{id}=useParams();const{getHotelById}=useBooking();const hotel=getHotelById(id);const history=useHistory();if(!hotel)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Hotel not found."})});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:hotel.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:hotel.img,alt:hotel.name,style:{maxWidth:480}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"muted",children:hotel.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"muted",children:hotel.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["From ",new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN',{style:'currency',currency:'INR'}).format(hotel.price)," / night \xB7 \u2B50",hotel.rating]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>history.push({pathname:'/book',state:{hotelId:hotel.id}}),children:"Book this hotel"})]});}
